      • withKey

        public DtUpdateOperation.Builder withKey(BinaryValue key)
        Set the key for this DtUpdateOperation.

        If not set or null, a key is generated by Riak and returned in the response.

        Parameters:
        key - the key.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.
